mapper.select: SELECT m.`MEMBER_ID` as `memberID`, m.`NICKNAME` as `nickname`, m.`PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH` as `profileImagePath`, ct.`IMAGE_PATH` as `characterImagePath`, m.`POINT` as `point` FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN CROW_TIT_BOOK ctb ON m.MEMBER_ID = ctb.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CROW_TIT ct ON ctb.CROW_TIT_ID = ct.CROW_TIT_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND ctb.IS_MAIN = TRUE;
SELECT m.MEMBER_ID AS `memberID`, m.NICKNAME AS `nickname`, m.PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH AS `profileImagePath` FROM `MEMBER` m WHERE m.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{query}, '%') LIMIT #{limit};

SELECT `res`.MEMBER_ID AS `memberID`, `res`.NICKNAME AS `nickname`, `res`.PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH AS `profileImagePath`, CASE WHEN f.IS_BLOCKED = FALSE THEN TRUE WHEN f.IS_BLOCKED IS NULL THEN FALSE END AS `isFriend` FROM (SELECT m.* FROM `MEMBER` m WHERE m.MEMBER_ID != #{memberID} AND m.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{query}, '%') LIMIT #{limit} ) AS `res` LEFT JOIN FRIEND f ON f.FROM_MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND f.TO_MEMBER_ID = `res`.MEMBER_ID;
